action.description: The action to display. It renders after the message, at the end of the alert.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

closeText.description:
Override the default label for the *close popup* icon button.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).

color.description: The main color for the alert. Unless provided, the value is taken from the `severity` prop.

icon.description:
Override the icon displayed before the children.
Unless provided, the icon is mapped to the value of the `severity` prop.

iconMapping.description:
The component maps the `severity` prop to a range of different icons,
for instance success to `<SuccessOutlined>`.
If you wish to change this mapping, you can provide your own.
Alternatively, you can use the `icon` prop to override the icon displayed.

onClose.description:
Callback fired when the component requests to be closed.
When provided and no `action` prop is set, a close icon button is displayed that triggers the callback when clicked.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The event source of the callback.
tags.name: event

role.description: The ARIA role attribute of the element.

severity.description: The severity of the alert. This defines the color and icon used.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.standardSuccess: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"` and `color="success"`.
descriptions.standardInfo: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"` and `color="info"`.
descriptions.standardWarning: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"` and `color="warning"`.
descriptions.standardError: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="standard"` and `color="error"`.
descriptions.outlinedSuccess: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="success"`.
descriptions.outlinedInfo: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="info"`.
descriptions.outlinedWarning: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="warning"`.
descriptions.outlinedError: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"` and `color="error"`.
descriptions.filledSuccess: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"` and `color="success"`.
descriptions.filledInfo: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"` and `color="info"`.
descriptions.filledWarning: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"` and `color="warning"`.
descriptions.filledError: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"` and `color="error"`.
descriptions.icon: Styles applied to the icon wrapper element.
descriptions.message: Styles applied to the message wrapper element.
descriptions.action: Styles applied to the action wrapper element if `action` is provided.
